name: Websri
tagline: Mobile App, Web Development and Web Design Company
description:
Websri (a unit of SSSPL) is a well established Lucknow based company operating and performing  for 7+ years with 2000+ successful projects delivered. Syncing client idea to reflect business objectives  is our key strategy to provide solutions that are industry ready and generate high ROI. Our technical expertise and transparent work ethics have been acknowledged by Fortune 500 brands.
We have our expertise in a, Web Development and Web and App designs. Our 7+ year experience we have long list of our satisfied clients which are our strong pillar to have goodwill in the Industry.
We have deal with more than 2,000 ventures and stretch out end-to-end IT-empowered solutions and services to a broad spectrum of industry verticals ranging from Wedding Websites, Health and Fitness, Pharmacy and Medicines, Real Estate, Information and technology, Travel and Hospitality, Energy and so forth.
We offer services like:
Customised Mobile App  Development
Custom Software Development
Custom Web Application Development
Cloud Services and Support
Full SEO services
Security & Compliance
Quality Assurance & testing
UX Strategy
UX Design
